languages.text: {n}Она натянуто улыбается вам.{/n} "Ну мы пойдем. У нас из бригады троих обварило кипящим маслом, пока мы эту штуку в первый раз калибровали. В общем, удачи вам. Постарайтесь не умереть!"

traits.locale_text: "Страдание умрет в лучах последнего рассвета" {n}Идира отвечает после небольшой паузы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Her mouth stretches in a strained smile.{/n} "We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"
languages.original_text: {n}Она натянуто улыбается вам.{/n} "Ну мы пойдем. У нас из бригады троих обварило кипящим маслом, пока мы эту штуку в первый раз калибровали. В общем, удачи вам. Постарайтесь не умереть!"

traits.locale_text: {n}She smiles a strained smile at you.{/n}We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"
{n}She smiles a strained smile at you.{/n}We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"

{n}Her mouth stretches in a strained smile.{/n} "We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"

languages.text: {n}Ihr Mund verzerrt sich zu einem angestrengten Lächeln.{/n} "Dann gehen wir mal. Drei Mitglieder unserer Crew wurden von siedendem Öl verbrannt, als wir dieses Ding das erste Mal kalibriert haben. Wie dem auch sei, viel Glück. Versucht, nicht draufzugehen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Her mouth stretches in a strained smile.{/n} "We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr Mund verzerrt sich zu einem angestrengten Lächeln.{/n} Dann gehen wir mal. Drei Mitglieder unserer Crew wurden von siedendem Öl verbrannt, als wir dieses Ding das erste Mal kalibriert haben. Wie dem auch sei, viel Glück. Versucht, nicht draufzugehen!"

languages.text: {n}Sa bouche s'étire en un sourire forcé.{/n} « On va y aller dans ce cas. Trois membres de notre unité ont été ébouillantés par de l'huile la première fois qu'on a calibré ce canon. Bonne chance. Essayez de ne pas vous faire tuer ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Her mouth stretches in a strained smile.{/n} "We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sa bouche s'étire en un sourire forcé.{/n} « On va y aller dans ce cas. Trois membres de notre unité ont été ébouillantés par de l'huile la première fois qu'on a calibré ce canon. Bonne chance. Essayez de ne pas vous faire tuer ! »

languages.text: {n}她咧开嘴巴，勉强地笑了笑。{/n}“那我们就走吧。我们第一次校准这个东西的时候，就有三个人被热油烫伤了。不管怎样，祝你好运。别死了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Her mouth stretches in a strained smile.{/n} "We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}她咧开嘴巴，勉强地笑了笑。{/n}“那我们就走吧。我们第一次校准这个东西的时候，就有三个人被热油烫伤了。不管怎样，祝你好运。别死了！”

languages.text: {n}彼女の口元に強ばった笑顔が広がる。{/n}「それじゃあ、行くわね。この装置を初めて調整した時、私たちのクルーに熱い油がかかったことがあるんだから。とにかく、幸運を祈るわ。死なないようにね！」
languages.original_text: {n}Her mouth stretches in a strained smile.{/n} "We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の口元に強ばった笑顔が広がる。{/n}「それじゃあ、行くわね。この装置を初めて調整した時、私たちのクルーに熱い油がかかったことがあるんだから。とにかく、幸運を祈るわ。死なないようにね！」

languages.text: {n}Su boca hace una sonrisa tensa.{/n} «Bueno, ya nos vamos. Tres personas de nuestro equipo se escaldaron con aceite hirviendo cuando calibramos este aparato por primera vez. En fin, buena suerte. ¡Trate de sobrevivir!».
languages.original_text: {n}Her mouth stretches in a strained smile.{/n} "We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Su boca hace una sonrisa tensa.{/n} «Bueno, ya nos vamos. Tres personas de nuestro equipo se escaldaron con aceite hirviendo cuando calibramos este aparato por primera vez. En fin, buena suerte. ¡Trate de sobrevivir!».

languages.text: {n}Ağzı zoraki bir gülümsemeyle geriliyor.{/n} "O zaman biz kaçalım. Bu topu ilk kalibre edişimizde ekipten üç kişi kaynar yağla haşlandı. Neyse, bol şans size. Ölmemeye çalışın!"
languages.original_text: {n}Her mouth stretches in a strained smile.{/n} "We'll get going then. We had three people in our crew get scalded with boiling oil when we first calibrated this thing. Anyway, good luck. Try not to die!"
